short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful html and JavaScript preprocessor and builder for easy creating GUI applications (EXE) and Web Pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Furia Script is a handy and easy to understand preprocessor and builder that can assist you in developing Microsoft Windows applications and Websites using JavaScript and HTML elements, which you can then compile and export to EXE files or single HTML Websites. It's perfect for creating:
- system tools for processing files, registry, data from the Web,
- user interfaces with advanced GUI components,
- data processing applications,
- games, etc.

Main features:
- Easy Windows-compatible executables (EXE files) development and compilation using HTML, HTML5 and JS elements,
- Easy Websites development,
- Files manipulation functions,
- System Registry access,
- Processes access functions,
- Win32 DLLs support,
- Network/Emails access functions,
- Wide set of libraries,
- Free support.
